refnamediv.refpurpose: Activate an instrument for an indefinite time.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Activate an instrument for an indefinite time.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: insnum -- instrument number to be activated
itime (optional, default=0) -- delay, in seconds, after which instrument insnum will be activated. Default is 0.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: turnon activates instrument insnum after a delay of itime seconds, or immediately if itime is not specified. Instrument is active until explicitly turned off. (See turnoff.)
